item.description: For those of you who cannot make the regular Tuesday meeting, here is an opportunity to share in our success. We've been meeting since the fall and are starting to refer and create new business for the professionals who participate. Please contact me for specific testimonials and questions!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby, Pearl Street entrance

group.name: The Boston Green Business Networking Group

item.name: New Wednesday Night Meeting!
